    • Uses of NanoleafException in io.github.rowak.nanoleafapi.util

      Methods in io.github.rowak.nanoleafapi.util that throw NanoleafException 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      static String NanoleafSetup.createAccessToken(String host, int port)
      Creates a unique authentication token that exists until it is destroyed using the NanoleafSetup.destroyAccessToken(java.lang.String, int, java.lang.String) method.
      static void NanoleafSetup.destroyAccessToken(NanoleafDevice device)
      Permanently destroys the access token associated with a Nanoleaf device.
      static void NanoleafSetup.destroyAccessToken(String host, int port, String accessToken)
      Permanently destroys an access token.
